pages.text: Yakby zhyteli tsykh selyshch uviruvaly y buly bohoboyazlyvymy, My b vidkryly yim blahoslovennya nebes i zemli. Ale vony vvazhaly tse za brekhnyu, tozh My skaraly yikh za te, shcho vony sobi zdobuvaly
Nevzhe zhyteli selyshch vvazhaly, shcho Nashe pokarannya ne pryyde do nykh unochi, koly vony splyatʹ
Nevzhe zhyteli selyshch vvazhaly, shcho Nashe pokarannya ne pryyde do nykh zranku, koly vony viddayutʹsya zabavam
Nevzhe vony ne maly strakhu pered khytristyu Allaha? Ne mayutʹ strakhu pered khytristyu Allaha lyudy, yaki zaznayutʹ vtrat
Khiba ne poyasneno tym, yaki otrymaly zemlyu v spadok vid yiyi kolyshnikh zhyteliv, shcho, koly My pobazhayemo, skarayemo yikh za yikhni hrikhy? My zapechataly yikhni sertsya, tozh ne slukhayutʹ vony

My rozpovidayemo tobi zvistky pro tsi selyshcha. Yikhni poslantsi prykhodyly do nykh iz yasnymy znamennyamy, ale vony ne viryly v te, shcho vzhe ranishe spryynyaly yak brekhnyu. Tak Allah nakladaye pechatʹ na sertsya neviruyuchykh
My ne znayshly bilʹshosti z nykh viddanymy zavitu. Ale My znayshly bilʹshistʹ iz nykh nechestyvtsyamy
Pislya nykh My poslaly Musu z Nashymy znamennyamy do Firauna y nablyzhenykh yoho. Ale vony vchynyly z nymy nespravedlyvo. Pohlyanʹ zhe, yakyy buv kinetsʹ nechestyvtsiv
Musa skazav: «O Firaune! YA — poslanetsʹ vid Hospoda svitiv
